post.body: It's a good day when that happens right?
Get out???!!!
You should be!!!
Good move seeing as you have been out of the country!
I like your pic better. I never recognized the wreath as you!
Thanks for the offer Brittany!!! I should do a give a way with those damn cookies!
You're welcome!
Good idea
Mine has become a 2 day project and I hate it
WORKED FOR ME
OMG see how lucky she was????
Thanks so I could double it and be alright. Thanks for the heads up on that!
I realized that after I typed. To put in a tin for gifts.
That is good news Andrea!
It is luck that she wasn't hurt worse!
They look really good! Are they just as good without the glaze as tin cookies? SU'd
thanks
So glad you tried these. They looked really good!!! Yours look wondeful and I am so glad their recipe worked. LOL!
we are at the Pain mgmt. Clinic to find out what they can do for T's pain. He won't take anymore drugs so...
I cancelled newspapers and everything. I truly know hiw you feel, but I feel much better without the bombardment if negativity!!!
I think I've resigned myself to the fact that I have no focus but in the end it all gets done! LOL
Hubbies Italian! We'll eat it up!
I see minimal traffic from them
I stay away from it all. Read the headlines so you're not totally out of it but skip the details!
Well that's good news!!!
Thanks
Thanks. 5lbs of Barilla pasta!
Thanks!
Thanks. Just wierd to not see her!
YAY!!!
good Morning Jo
Very good Ben. Beautiful weather, easy morning and it's FRIDAY!!!!!
That's the spirit!!! Now just to find the time...
I think banished...LOL!
yes I store all my family pics on there in case puter crashes!
get one of those small scan disk plug ins and store them on that. There called up drives I think.
you don't totally suck... You made me laugh!
I noticed something was wrong but just assumed you were working on it!
SU'd
Very pretty !!!
Maybe if you share it with him...
@constablesblog Thanks!!!
Funny!!!
So funny. Like we invented pizza!!!! LOL! Yours looked way better and was more original. Mine was fast, delicious and easy!!
No I guess mine was the "white trash" model. LOL!
Butter...
LOL!!! Had you entered this I would have bowed down to you but....
No, no remember you went and hunted the chanterelles and I used crappy dried shrooms and arugula pesto.
Thanks a lot!!!
That's the second time today you have watched her...I think you *like* her!!!
I don't even know why I am responding. I don;t know how. It doesn't work...I'm waiting for butter to thaw out AGAIN!!!
when twitter.com is too busy you get a fail whale! big whale with water coming out his spout!
Wow...how incredibly generous of you! You totally rock!
Ugh...hate the fail whale!
SU'd love those
Thanks Jo i love candid shots of them playing!
not as bad as it should be...
but you are Mr. Chrisymas spirit! you had me listening to christmas music right after turket day! find that spirit...
I'm so proud of you! i haven't done it...yet!
My Mom is here so that makes it all better!
I always do but we had just gotten in and it was a little chaotic...
HaHa!
I am braising a chuck roast in my big AllClad and took it out to flip the beef. graabed the lid to put it back on...
Slowly and with one hand
Of course not! What is that?
I did and ice. Now i have burn ointment and can't do anything!
Big oh no!
I have cream all over it but it'salready blistering! i'll know in a little bit how bad it is
Can't use it but am not hospital bound!
Wow my plastic wrap just stuck to what it was suppose to!
It is soooo hot an dhumid. It's already 81 inside but I don't want to shut it up and turn on the air!!! How can I even think about baking?
I have bok choy, mizuna and arugula left from my CSA any ideas?
I have to get this house cleaned, laundry done, cookies baked.
I hope this really long wait is a sign that they are fixing T up!!!
No. I see minimal
Night tweeps.
Acura just sent me 2 Riedel wine glasses. I'm gonna go make sure they fit in my cup holders...
